price: Enti mmusuo bi fri wo Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ bɛtwaa (afuo no) ho hyiae (hyee no pasaa) wͻ εberε a, na wͻn adeda.
arabic: فَطَافَ عَلَيۡهَا طَآئِفٞ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمۡ نَآئِمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: faṭāfa ʿalayhā ṭāifun min rabbika wahum nāimūna
